name: Transaction
description: The Transaction class represents a transaction in Revit. All changes to the Revit model must be made within a transaction.

properties.name: Name
properties.description: Gets or sets the name of the transaction.

properties.name: Status
properties.description: Gets the status of the transaction.

properties.name: HasEnded
properties.description: Indicates whether the transaction has ended.

properties.name: HasStarted
properties.description: Indicates whether the transaction has started.

methods.name: Commit()
methods.description: Commits the changes made in the transaction.

methods.name: RollBack()
methods.description: Rolls back the changes made in the transaction.
